very happy with my purchase. the hoodie is quite thick and perfect for winters. worth the price and I recommend buying it. go for a size larger tho. also im amazed by Myntra’s service. the delivery process only took a day :)

"The Roadster Black Men Hooded sweatshirt is a stylish and comfortable option for everyday wear. The material feels durable, and the fit is true to size. The black color is versatile and easy to pair with different outfits. However, the hoodie's fabric may not be very breathable, which could be uncomfortable in warmer weather. Overall, it's a solid choice for those looking for a trendy yet functional hoodie."

comments.comment: Issue with the sizing of H&M. For 6ft 1" person Body fit is good with L size but is short in length. And you can't buy XL as it is too much loose around body. So no perfect fit for tall person

The cloth is just something I've never seen and touched before. The fabric is softer than anything I've worn in the past and I'm impressed. It also keeps you warm and sometimes makes you sweat a little :)
This product is totally amazing, fitting is so good, but I want over size then I wear large size.
The hoodie was really soft and comfortable. I love it. The colour looks exactly the same as shown in the picture. Go one size larger for a more relaxed and comfortable fit
perfect fit as expected . good product from h&m under this budget
Actually the product is very good. It wasn't a proper fit for me but if you order the right size it is the finest product. Also lacks a little bit in terms of design.

A product of great quality which is to be expected from h&m

The product is very good and the fabric is also very good. It's been two years since I bought it and there have been no complaints yet. The size of the product is perfect but sleeve lenght is little short. I bought size L.

comments.comment: The H&M relaxed fit sweatshirt purchased from Myntra exceeded my expectations in both comfort and style. The fabric is incredibly soft and feels luxurious against the skin, making it perfect for all-day wear. The relaxed fit provides ample room for movement without sacrificing the silhouette, giving it a flattering look. I appreciate the versatility of this sweatshirt; it pairs effortlessly with various bottoms for different occasions, whether it's lounging at home or running errands. The quality is top-notch, and the design is timeless, ensuring it remains a staple in my wardrobe for years to come. Myntra's seamless shopping experience and prompt delivery made the entire process hassle-free. Overall, I highly recommend this sweatshirt to anyone looking for both comfort and style.

I recently purchased a sweatshirt, and it has quickly become a staple in my wardrobe. The fabric is incredibly soft and cozy, making it perfect for lounging at home or running errands on chilly days. The design is simple yet stylish, with a classic crew neck and a relaxed fit that's both comfortable and flattering. I appreciate the attention to detail in the stitching, which seems sturdy and well-made. What sets this sweatshirt apart is its versatility - I can easily dress it up with jeans and sneakers for a casual outing or layer it under a jacket for extra warmth. Overall, I'm impressed with the quality and comfort of this sweatshirt, and I would highly recommend it to anyone in need of a cozy yet chic addition to their wardrobe.

Dresses are versatile wardrobe staples that come in a wide range of styles, colors, and fabrics, suitable for various occasions. From casual sundresses to elegant evening gowns, dresses offer endless options for expressing personal style and making a fashion statement. 

When choosing a dress, factors such as fit, fabric quality, design details, and overall comfort are essential considerations. A well-fitted dress can accentuate the body's silhouette and enhance confidence, while high-quality fabrics ensure durability and long-term wear.

In terms of trends, the fashion industry continually introduces new styles and designs, ranging from timeless classics to trendy, avant-garde creations. Keeping up with current trends can

The H&M brown sweatshirt exceeded my expectations with its comfortable fabric and stylish design. The soft material feels great against the skin, and the fit is just right. The rich brown color adds a touch of sophistication, making it a versatile addition to my wardrobe. Overall, a fantastic purchase that combines both comfort and style at an affordable price.

4/5 Stars
I recently purchased this sweatshirt from H&M, and overall, I'm pretty happy with it! The material is soft and cozy, perfect for lounging around or running errands. The fit is relaxed but not too baggy, and the color is exactly as pictured. I appreciate the simple design and the fact that it's not too flashy. The quality is good, but not exceptional - the stitching could be a bit neater, and the fabric might pill slightly over time. However, for the price point, I'm more than satisfied. It's a great addition to my casual wardrobe, and I'd definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable and affordable sweatshirt

That's exactly what I needed it, sweatshirt with superb soft thermal fabric inside & perfect for Delhi winters, love that chocolate brown colour, same as shown in their images. I have gone with XL size which is quite a relaxing fit for me as my height is 6feet and I don't mind wearing it even while sleeping..but if anyone is looking for exact fit, go for one size smaller then your normal size.... Simple but quite advisable will surely be recommending this and till then I'm buying one more for sure....thanks a lot H&M ....Last but not least I would request myntra to work on product description as none of your product description states that the fabric is suitable for summer or winter, plz do the needful as it may help us a lot and we can ignore return/exchange atleast..!!  ??

I recently purchased the H&M Men Black Relaxed Fit Hoodie from Myntra, and I am quite pleased with my purchase. Here are my thoughts:

Fit and Comfort:
The relaxed fit of this hoodie is spot-on. It offers a loose, comfortable fit that is perfect for casual wear. The fabric is soft and feels great against the skin, making it ideal for both lounging at home and going out.

Material and Quality:
The hoodie is made from a blend of cotton and polyester, which strikes a good balance between comfort and durability. The stitching is strong and the material feels premium for the price. H&M has once again delivered

Worth the hype
1. Material -was veryy good i have used other normal brands but this is wayy better
2. Fit-was lose its like baggy types i am 5,11 and order the M size the body is very good (baggy type) but the bicep area is a bit lose otherwise the  fit is too good
3 color -its like off white my skin type is slightly brown like i was skeptical but its good 

Conclusion goo for it and order according to your height can give u best fit

Hey there! So, I recently got my hands on this awesome hoodie from H&M, and let me tell you, it's absolutely fantastic! The material is super soft and cozy, perfect for those chilly days. The fit is just right, not too tight or too loose. I love the stylish design and the attention to detail. The hoodie also has a nice kangaroo pocket in the front, which is great for keeping my hands warm or storing small items. Overall, I'm really impressed with this H&M hoodie and I highly recommend it! 😄👍

This H&M Hoodie is the ultimate combination of comfort, style, and versatility. Whether you're looking for a casual layer for everyday wear, a sporty option for workouts, or a trendy statement piece, this hoodie has you covered.With its soft and cozy fabric, stylish design, and functional details like the kangaroo pocket, it's no wonder this hoodie has become a staple in my wardrobe. I highly recommend the H&M Hoodie to anyone looking for a comfortable and stylish option that will last for years to come.

When I was checking out the pictures on Myntra, I wanted a hoodie that was oversized and was lengthy. I had previously bought the same hoodie in white colour, and it was PERFECT. This time its the same hoodie, but shorter in length. Just that. Except that, its very Good. The material is soft. The warmth is good, the packaging was great. Great job H&M. I love to buy clothes from you guys. But please make sure you accept the delivery as fast as you do on your app XD

But I really love your clothes, thanks again

The quality is very good, just as expected. I went for S size 'cause other sizes were not available, this size is overall good but I feel it's a little short from top to waist but S size still fits me very well. I'm 5'8 and slim, if you are like me then I'd suggest you to go for M size actually, you might feel the hood is a bit oversized but that should be okay

The sizes are all off; they send you European sizes instead of Indian. Just buy one size smaller.

Other than that, the quality is really not good. The stitches are all coming loose. The cloth's not the thickest/premium feeling in the world. 

But more Importantly, it's the most 6/10 thing ever. You'll most likely look like an NPC wearing this on its own (unless you wear something over it).

Would've given it 3 stars but decided on 2 for a reason. Can't state the reason though, Big Brother Myntra doesn't like it when the review mentions things that are IMPORTANT in a review. Pretty sure I can't complain about Myntra as well.

This review's gonna get rejected as well isn't it.

comments.comment: I recently ordered a hoodie from Myntra, and I have to say, the quality is fantastic. The fabric feels great, and the stitching is top-notch. However, I made the mistake of ordering the wrong size, so it didn't fit me well. My advice to fellow shoppers: double-check the sizing chart before placing your order to avoid any sizing issues. Overall, I'm impressed with the quality of the product, but I'll definitely be more careful with sizing next time.
One of the best hoodies from h&m, buy one size less than usual size , soft and thick material very good for heavy winters , the print quality is also very nice 👌

This is the best piece of cloth I got my hand on, Superior cloth quality and best experience with mantra ￼in ordering this I ordered a medium size but it was bit short than I exchanged it with large size and it was a smooth exchange I loved the experience I means I was so quick and easy I loved mantra for this.

Let go of your everyday mediocrity as you don the name of the greatest Rock band in history. Do not hold back, let yourself shine. H&M hoodies are a solid option for budget-minded shoppers looking for a casual layer. They come in a wide range of colors and styles, from classic zip-ups to trendy oversized fits. The fleece material is usually soft and comfortable, and the price point is attractive.

 However, the quality can be a bit inconsistent. Some reviewers rave about the thickness and durability of their H&M hoodies, while others find them thin and prone to pilling (little balls of fabric that form on the surface). The fit can also be a gamble, especially for online shoppers. H&M hoodies tend to run large, so you might want to size down.

Discover the ultimate comfort and style with the H&M Regular Fit Hoodie from Myntra. Crafted from a premium cotton blend, it offers a snug yet relaxed fit that's perfect for any occasion. With its classic design, kangaroo pocket, and adjustable drawstrings, this hoodie is both functional and fashionable. Its versatility allows for easy pairing with any outfit, while its durability ensures long-lasting wear. Elevate your wardrobe with this essential piece today!
